alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:41PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Nez Perce and Lewis Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1241 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Winchester to 17 miles northwest of White Bird. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, Peck, Reubens and Mohler. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 268 and 287. U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho mile marker 36 and near mile marker 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
